commit_list.message: Converted ANSI encodes French and German lang files to UTF-8.
commit_list.repo_description: Arcade mod for FluxBB forum software.

commit_list.message: Added language support for Arcade mod admin plugin.
commit_list.repo_description: Arcade mod for FluxBB forum software.

commit_list.message: Fixed a couple of double entries in the lang file.
commit_list.repo_description: Arcade mod for FluxBB forum software.

commit_list.message: Added config option to allow admin to set arcade access permission for guests (guests have access permission by default). Previously only logged in users could access the arcade. Also added additional lang file entry to notify guests attempting to submit scores that they first need to login or register.
commit_list.repo_description: Arcade mod for FluxBB forum software.

commit_list.message: Don't apply pun_trim to integers in the arcade mod's admin plugin. FluxBB returns an empty string when applying pun_trim to integers.
commit_list.repo_description: Arcade mod for FluxBB forum software.

commit_list.message: Replaced some text not covered by lang file entries with lang file entries.
commit_list.repo_description: Arcade mod for FluxBB forum software.

commit_list.message: Added French language file for the Arcade Mod.
commit_list.repo_description: Arcade mod for FluxBB forum software.

commit_list.message: Added German language file for the Arcade Mod.
commit_list.repo_description: Arcade mod for FluxBB forum software.

commit_list.message: Adapted Arcade Mod for FluxBB.
commit_list.repo_description: Arcade mod for FluxBB forum software.

commit_list.message: Initial import based on PunBB Arcade Mod v1.2.0 for PunBB 1.2.
commit_list.repo_description: Arcade mod for FluxBB forum software.

commit_list.message: Do not decrement post counts of users who already have post counts of 0 when deleting posts. The result of decreasing posts counts when deleting topics should also never be less than 0. Tested in MySQL, PostgreSQL, SQLite and SQLite3.
commit_list.repo_description: FluxBB is a fast, light, user-friendly forum application for your website.

commit_list.message: Fix #2 Updated functions delete_post() and decrease_post_counts() to not decrement the guest post count when deleting guest posts/topics. Reported by Quy.
commit_list.repo_description: FluxBB is a fast, light, user-friendly forum application for your website.

commit_list.message: Fix #1 Added third required argument to function call delete_post in admin_users.php so that user post counts get decremented when deleting posts. Reported by Quy.
commit_list.repo_description: FluxBB is a fast, light, user-friendly forum application for your website.

commit_list.message: Use CSRF security tokens instead of checking the HTTP_REFERER to prevent CSRF attacks when submitting forms. Thanks to Visman for the suggestion.
commit_list.repo_description: FluxBB is a fast, light, user-friendly forum application for your website.

commit_list.message: Update to FluxBB 1.5.6.
commit_list.repo_description: FluxBB is a fast, light, user-friendly forum application for your website.

commit_list.message: Now user post counts get decremented when deleting posts/topics. The post count therefore now reflects the user's true number of posts in the forum. This also prevents spammers from artificially increasing their post counts (by continuously posting and deleting their post).
commit_list.repo_description: FluxBB is a fast, light, user-friendly forum application for your website.

commit_list.message: Also convert non core FluxBB tables (tables installed via mods, e.g. private messages) to UTF8 when running the db_update script. Note however that only tables with 'id' columns will be converted.
commit_list.repo_description: FluxBB is a fast, light, user-friendly forum application for your website.

commit_list.message: Fixed bug in the result method of SQLite3 DB layer.
commit_list.repo_description: FluxBB is a fast, light, user-friendly forum application for your website.

commit_list.message: Check if user table exists before trying to select user table rows, otherwise we get an error in SQLite3.
commit_list.repo_description: FluxBB is a fast, light, user-friendly forum application for your website.

commit_list.message: Adapted SQLite3 DB layer for FluxBB.
commit_list.repo_description: FluxBB is a fast, light, user-friendly forum application for your website.

commit_list.message: Initial import and implementation of SQLite3 DB layer used in PunBB 1.4.2.
commit_list.repo_description: FluxBB is a fast, light, user-friendly forum application for your website.

commit_list.message: Updated "Bad referrer" language definition with notification that JavaScript must be enabled.
commit_list.repo_description: FluxBB is a fast, light, user-friendly forum application for your website.

commit_list.message: Fix #3 Fixed bug in the result method of SQLite3 DB layer which caused the 2nd row of a result to be returned as the 3rd row.
commit_list.repo_description: FluxBB is a fast, light, user-friendly forum application for your website.

commit_list.message: Removed a couple of superfluous full stops from error messages. FluxBB's error function already adds a full stop to the end of the error message.
commit_list.repo_description: FluxBB is a fast, light, user-friendly forum application for your website.

commit_list.message: Update pun_trim function to also handle numbers. Previously pun_trim would return an empty string for numbers.
commit_list.repo_description: FluxBB is a fast, light, user-friendly forum application for your website.

commit_list.message: Implemented SQLite3 DB layer num_rows method. SQLite3 does not natively support num_rows, so I did this in a bit of a hacky way.
commit_list.repo_description: FluxBB is a fast, light, user-friendly forum application for your website.

commit_list.message: Fixed typo in install.php.
commit_list.repo_description: FluxBB is a fast, light, user-friendly forum application for your website.

commit_list.message: Initial import based on FluxBB 1.5.5.
commit_list.repo_description: FluxBB is a fast, light, user-friendly forum application for your website.

commit_list.message:
Merge pull request #4 from adaur/master

Fixed bug in the result method of SQLite3 DB layer which resulted in some run-time notices showing up. Thanks for the fix adaur.

commit_list.message: Fixed code typo in base.css (selector .linksb UL). Reported by JosJuice.
commit_list.repo_description: PunBB is a fast and lightweight PHP-powered discussion board.

commit_list.message: Do not decrement post counts of users who already have post counts of 0 when deleting posts. The result of decreasing posts counts when deleting topics should also never be less than 0. Tested in MySQL, PostgreSQL and SQLite.
commit_list.repo_description: PunBB is a fast and lightweight PHP-powered discussion board.

commit_list.message: Updated functions delete_post() and decrease_post_counts() to not decrement the guest post count when deleting guest posts/topics. Reported by Quy.
commit_list.repo_description: PunBB is a fast and lightweight PHP-powered discussion board.

commit_list.message: When deleting a post redirect to the previous post rather than the start of the topic.
commit_list.repo_description: PunBB is a fast and lightweight PHP-powered discussion board.

commit_list.message: Replace MSN Messenger with Microsoft Account.
commit_list.repo_description: PunBB is a fast and lightweight PHP-powered discussion board.

commit_list.message: Updated admin_prune.php to allow admin to prune unverified users.
commit_list.repo_description: PunBB is a fast and lightweight PHP-powered discussion board.

commit_list.message: Added option to search for unverified users in admin_users.php.
commit_list.repo_description: PunBB is a fast and lightweight PHP-powered discussion board.

commit_list.message: Fixed unable to add/edit/delete posts in PostgreSQL if the redirect delay is 0 seconds.
commit_list.repo_description: PunBB is a fast and lightweight PHP-powered discussion board.

commit_list.message: Update the bans table and regenerate the bans cache when renaming a banned user.
commit_list.repo_description: PunBB is a fast and lightweight PHP-powered discussion board.

commit_list.message: Display "bad request" message if user tries to visit a profile section that does not exist. Previously a blank page was shown.
commit_list.repo_description: PunBB is a fast and lightweight PHP-powered discussion board.

commit_list.message: Update "edited by" portion of posts when renaming a user.
commit_list.repo_description: PunBB is a fast and lightweight PHP-powered discussion board.

commit_list.message: Check username against the banned users list when registering, or when an admin/moderator changes someone's username in the profile.
commit_list.repo_description: PunBB is a fast and lightweight PHP-powered discussion board.

commit_list.message: Also apply "unread topic tracking" feature when showing search results as posts in search.php.
commit_list.repo_description: PunBB is a fast and lightweight PHP-powered discussion board.

commit_list.message: Update for 1.2.50.
commit_list.repo_description: PunBB is a fast and lightweight PHP-powered discussion board.

commit_list.message:
Revert "Use GMT date instead of server date when sending emails."

This reverts commit d83cdb09c51ad2b47343649424042c2996dcafa3.
commit_list.repo_description: PunBB is a fast and lightweight PHP-powered discussion board.

commit_list.message: Use explicit typecast in PostgreSQL adapter. If query resources are not explicitly cast to integers, it can fill up the error log.
commit_list.repo_description: PunBB is a fast and lightweight PHP-powered discussion board.

commit_list.message: Fixed a password recovery vulnerability.
commit_list.repo_description: PunBB is a fast and lightweight PHP-powered discussion board.

commit_list.message: Now checks at PunRes instead of PunBB for new version when clicking the link "Check for upgrade" at admin_index.php.
commit_list.repo_description: PunBB is a fast and lightweight PHP-powered discussion board.

commit_list.message: Fixed some links in the documentation.
commit_list.repo_description: PunBB is a fast and lightweight PHP-powered discussion board.

commit_list.message: Fixed XSS vulnerability in profile.php (only exploitable by admins).
commit_list.repo_description: PunBB is a fast and lightweight PHP-powered discussion board.

commit_list.message: Added forum_is_writable() function to check whether a file/folder is truly writable. Previously the function is_writable() was used. The problem with the function is_writable() is that it ignores ACLs on Windows NTFS Server, and can return true when the file/folder is actually not writable.
commit_list.repo_description: PunBB is a fast and lightweight PHP-powered discussion board.

commit_list.message: Added the ability to use style specific templates (tpl files). These are more or less the same changes as made by the Style Installer mod or the Dynamic Template mod. PunRes was originally designed to give you the option to include style specific templates when uploading a style, but previously one had to modify some forum files before one could make use of these templates.
commit_list.repo_description: PunBB is a fast and lightweight PHP-powered discussion board.

commit_list.message: Installer now automatically creates the config.php configuration file.
commit_list.repo_description: PunBB is a fast and lightweight PHP-powered discussion board.

commit_list.message: Use a better method of guessing base_url in install.php.
commit_list.repo_description: PunBB is a fast and lightweight PHP-powered discussion board.

commit_list.message: Mask characters entered in the password fields in install.php.
commit_list.repo_description: PunBB is a fast and lightweight PHP-powered discussion board.

commit_list.message: Fixed a missing var initialization in javascript.
commit_list.repo_description: PunBB is a fast and lightweight PHP-powered discussion board.

commit_list.message: Fixed typo in admin_bans.php.
commit_list.repo_description: PunBB is a fast and lightweight PHP-powered discussion board.

commit_list.message: Made some text changes to admin_maintenance.php and install.php.
commit_list.repo_description: PunBB is a fast and lightweight PHP-powered discussion board.

commit_list.message: Improved registration page (register.php). Registration errors are now displayed inline. Previously, in some browsers like Firefox, one had to restart the whole form when registration errors were generated.
commit_list.repo_description: PunBB is a fast and lightweight PHP-powered discussion board.

commit_list.message: Use intval() instead of is_numeric() to fix the XSS vulnerability involving the page number variable. This vulnerability was originally fixed in 1.2.20 by using is_numeric(), but using intval() is a better method.
commit_list.repo_description: PunBB is a fast and lightweight PHP-powered discussion board.

commit_list.message: Cleaned up some code (removed extra tabs, converted some spaces into tabs etc.).
commit_list.repo_description: PunBB is a fast and lightweight PHP-powered discussion board.

commit_list.message: When you are posting to a topic to which you are subscribed, a ticked tickbox labeled "Stay subscribed to this topic" is now shown. Previously a tickbox labeled "Subscribe to this topic" was shown, and was not ticked, regardless of whether you were subscribed to the topic or not.
commit_list.repo_description: PunBB is a fast and lightweight PHP-powered discussion board.

commit_list.message: When showing search results as topics, order search results by "last post date" instead of "topic creation date".
commit_list.repo_description: PunBB is a fast and lightweight PHP-powered discussion board.

commit_list.message: Redirect to "edit ban" page when banning an already banned user.
commit_list.repo_description: PunBB is a fast and lightweight PHP-powered discussion board.

commit_list.message: Now user post counts get decremented when deleting posts/topics. The post count therefore now reflects the user's true number of posts in the forum. This also prevents spammers from artificially increasing their post counts (by continuously posting and deleting their post).
commit_list.repo_description: PunBB is a fast and lightweight PHP-powered discussion board.

commit_list.message: When running the installer, enable/disable avatars depending on file_uploads setting in PHP configuration.
commit_list.repo_description: PunBB is a fast and lightweight PHP-powered discussion board.

commit_list.message: Fixed possible exploit in install.php with unknown DB type.
commit_list.repo_description: PunBB is a fast and lightweight PHP-powered discussion board.

commit_list.message: In install.php, added some random bytes at the end of the cookie name to prevent collisions.
commit_list.repo_description: PunBB is a fast and lightweight PHP-powered discussion board.

commit_list.message: Fixed issue in installer where install button got disabled in Firefox when going back after the display of an error message.
commit_list.repo_description: PunBB is a fast and lightweight PHP-powered discussion board.

commit_list.message: Automatically delete old zapped reports (which cannot be viewed anyway).
commit_list.repo_description: PunBB is a fast and lightweight PHP-powered discussion board.

commit_list.message: Sort plugins displayed in the admin interface case insensitive alphabetically. Previously they were sorted by date created.
commit_list.repo_description: PunBB is a fast and lightweight PHP-powered discussion board.

commit_list.message: Do case insensitive alphabetical sort when displaying languages and styles in the user's profile and in admin/options (use natcasesort instead of natsort). Previously styles and languages would have been displayed a-z and then A-Z.
commit_list.repo_description: PunBB is a fast and lightweight PHP-powered discussion board.

commit_list.message: Use GMT date instead of server date when sending emails.
commit_list.repo_description: PunBB is a fast and lightweight PHP-powered discussion board.

commit_list.message: Improved performance for large topics.
commit_list.repo_description: PunBB is a fast and lightweight PHP-powered discussion board.

commit_list.message: Fixed the version comparison function.
commit_list.repo_description: PunBB is a fast and lightweight PHP-powered discussion board.

commit_list.message: Fixed undefined variable for guest posting when email address is not required.
commit_list.repo_description: PunBB is a fast and lightweight PHP-powered discussion board.

commit_list.message: Added banned email check for guest posting. This is to prevent a banned user from postings as a guest using the same email address used in his/her banned account. Also prevent banned guest users (a guest with a banned email address) from receiving form emails.
commit_list.repo_description: PunBB is a fast and lightweight PHP-powered discussion board.

commit_list.message: Escape the email address in post.php and register.php.
commit_list.repo_description: PunBB is a fast and lightweight PHP-powered discussion board.

commit_list.message: Replaced some text in moderate.php, register.php and search.php with their appropriate lang file entries.
commit_list.repo_description: PunBB is a fast and lightweight PHP-powered discussion board.

commit_list.message: In search.php, prefix sticky topic with "Sticky: " when displaying search results.
commit_list.repo_description: PunBB is a fast and lightweight PHP-powered discussion board.

commit_list.message: Allow search where author username in 2 characters or more. In PunBB the minimum length username is 2 characters, so one should therefore be able to search for users with a 2 character username. Previously the minimum length of author username one could search for was 3 characters.
commit_list.repo_description: PunBB is a fast and lightweight PHP-powered discussion board.

commit_list.message: Fixed minor logic error in userlist.php.
commit_list.repo_description: PunBB is a fast and lightweight PHP-powered discussion board.

commit_list.message: Removed "&action=foo" part from the admin section in profile. This part was not required and I've seen it cause some errors in some configurations.
commit_list.repo_description: PunBB is a fast and lightweight PHP-powered discussion board.

commit_list.message: Fixed typo in admin_options.php.
commit_list.repo_description: PunBB is a fast and lightweight PHP-powered discussion board.

commit_list.message: Fixed typo in install.php.
commit_list.repo_description: PunBB is a fast and lightweight PHP-powered discussion board.

commit_list.message: Added additional checks for the existence of PHP Accelerator/Optimizers in admin_index.php.
commit_list.repo_description: PunBB is a fast and lightweight PHP-powered discussion board.

commit_list.message: Remove height and width attributes of smilies in case you add smilies that are larger or smaller than 15x15px.
commit_list.repo_description: PunBB is a fast and lightweight PHP-powered discussion board.

commit_list.message: Send the Content-type header in case the web server is setup to send something else.
commit_list.repo_description: PunBB is a fast and lightweight PHP-powered discussion board.

commit_list.message: Admin now can set board default timezone that is used for guests. When users register, this will also be the default timezone selection. There is also no need anymore to set server timezone (it is detected automatically).
commit_list.repo_description: PunBB is a fast and lightweight PHP-powered discussion board.

commit_list.message: Increased visit timeout to 60 minutes to accommodate "unread topic tracking" feature.
commit_list.repo_description: PunBB is a fast and lightweight PHP-powered discussion board.

commit_list.message: Added database based "unread topic tracking" feature. These are the same changes as made by the Mark topics as read mod, but with some improvements and bug fixes.
commit_list.repo_description: PunBB is a fast and lightweight PHP-powered discussion board.

commit_list.message: Improved database update script. It can now handle add_field, remove_field etc. database update operations in SQLite and PostgeSQL.
commit_list.repo_description: PunBB is a fast and lightweight PHP-powered discussion board.

commit_list.message: Check whether magic_quotes_runtime is active before attempting to turn magic_quotes off in extern.php, install.php and the database update script.
commit_list.repo_description: PunBB is a fast and lightweight PHP-powered discussion board.

commit_list.message: Also strip slashes from REQUEST if magic_quotes_gpc is enabled.
commit_list.repo_description: PunBB is a fast and lightweight PHP-powered discussion board.

commit_list.message: Fixed issue that caused authentication cookie being set incorrectly in some cases.
commit_list.repo_description: PunBB is a fast and lightweight PHP-powered discussion board.

commit_list.message: Fixed a small bug with quiet visits causing an error.
commit_list.repo_description: PunBB is a fast and lightweight PHP-powered discussion board.

commit_list.message: Modified install.php to use "ENGINE" instead of deprecated "TYPE" when creating database tables in MySQL.
commit_list.repo_description: PunBB is a fast and lightweight PHP-powered discussion board.

commit_list.message: Fixed an inadequate type check on uploaded avatars.
commit_list.repo_description: PunBB is a fast and lightweight PHP-powered discussion board.

commit_list.message: Added missing break statement to admin_maintenance.php.
commit_list.repo_description: PunBB is a fast and lightweight PHP-powered discussion board.

commit_list.message: Added missing > to edit.php.
commit_list.repo_description: PunBB is a fast and lightweight PHP-powered discussion board.

commit_list.message: Changed sha1 calls to pun_hash calls.
commit_list.repo_description: PunBB is a fast and lightweight PHP-powered discussion board.

commit_list.message: Fixed a bug with admin_maintenance.php that potentially led to reindexing not being done properly.
commit_list.repo_description: PunBB is a fast and lightweight PHP-powered discussion board.

commit_list.message: Removed copyright notice on admin_index.php and footer.php.
commit_list.repo_description: PunBB is a fast and lightweight PHP-powered discussion board.

commit_list.message: Imported docs from PunBB 1.2.17.
commit_list.repo_description: PunBB is a fast and lightweight PHP-powered discussion board.

commit_list.message: Initial import based on PunBB 1.2.23.
commit_list.repo_description: PunBB is a fast and lightweight PHP-powered discussion board.

repo_list.description: FluxBB is a fast, light, user-friendly forum application for your website.
